trait.name: Brave
entries: Mr. Greystone has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mr. Greystone hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mr. Greystone makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.
